1: Stayed here with a large group for a conference and the food was amazing and service excellent
Quick Thank You for making the stay with you the highlight of our entire trip in Spain
Had a super stay august 2015 would recommend for couples or families
it is about a 15 minute walk along the waterfront so it is easy to get out for a day trip to Taragona or Sitges or Barcelona even
We stayed here on a family holiday two adults and four teenagers
Oh yes I have to go back my family and coworkers noticed how happy I am
I highly recommend Le Meridien Ra for families and couples

However the water is fast deep so best for children aged 10 years and over is my own assessment for teenager and adults its perfect But there is also a lovely pool which is suitable for children at the top of the hotels roof with lounge furniture
Family and kids friendly lots of private corners to sit and relax
From beginning to the end this was memorable vacations
